Angel's Wings.name: Angel's Wings
Angel's Wings.effect: White wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

Great Oracular Bubble.name: Great Oracular Bubble
Great Oracular Bubble.effect: Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble. The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

Night-and-Flame Stance.name: Night-and-Flame Stance
Night-and-Flame Stance.effect: Sweep forward with a burst of flames

Radahn's Rain.name: Radahn's Rain
Radahn's Rain.effect: The arrows will pour on foes like rain

Taker's Flames.name: Taker's Flames
Taker's Flames.effect: Set things ablaze and steal HP

Transient Moonlight.name: Transient Moonlight
Transient Moonlight.effect: Attacks fire off a wave of light.

Bloodhound's Step.name: Bloodhound's Step
Bloodhound's Step.effect: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

Alabaster Lords' Pull.name: Alabaster Lords' Pull
Alabaster Lords' Pull.effect: Create a gravity well dealing damage and pulling enemies in

Bear Witness!.name: Bear Witness!
Bear Witness!.effect: Grand the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

Bloodboon Ritual.name: Bloodboon Ritual
Bloodboon Ritual.effect:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother.
Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.
This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

Cursed-Blood Slice.name: Cursed-Blood Slice
Cursed-Blood Slice.effect: Charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice

Death Flare.name: Death Flare
Death Flare.effect: Inflicting the death ailment upon foes

Destined Death.name: Destined Death
Destined Death.effect:
Dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's
maximum HP and continues to wear down HP

Devourer of Worlds.name: Devourer of Worlds
Devourer of Worlds.effect: Charge the scepter with magic to steal HP

Dynast's Finesse.name: Dynast's Finesse
Dynast's Finesse.effect: Avoid an attack while getting some distance from foes to follow up with strong attack to lunge do another strong attack for a sweeping slice

Eochaid's Dancing Blade.name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
Eochaid's Dancing Blade.effect: Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning. Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

Flame Dance.name: Flame Dance
Flame Dance.effect: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

Flowing Form.name: Flowing Form
Flowing Form.effect: Transforms armament into its liquid form

I Command Thee, Kneel!.name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
I Command Thee, Kneel!.effect:
Unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.
Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave.

Ice Lightning Sword.name: Ice Lightning Sword
Ice Lightning Sword.effect: Call down a bolt of ice lightning

Knowledge Above All.name: Knowledge Above All
Knowledge Above All.effect:
Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all
within the area, including the caster

Last Rites.name: Last Rites
Last Rites.effect: Grant Sacred Order to yourself and allies in the area

Magma Guillotine.name: Magma Guillotine
Magma Guillotine.effect: Triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

Mists of Slumber.name: Mists of Slumber
Mists of Slumber.effect: Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area. This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

Moonlight Greatsword.name: Moonlight Greatsword
Moonlight Greatsword.effect:
Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with
frost

Nebula.name: Nebula
Nebula.effect: Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic

Reduvia Blood Blade.name: Reduvia Blood Blade
Reduvia Blood Blade.effect: Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloostains into airborne blood blades that cause hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

Shriek of Milos.name: Shriek of Milos
Shriek of Milos.effect: reduces all damage negation and status resistances

Siluria's Woe.name: Siluria's Woe
Siluria's Woe.effect: Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind.

Starcaller Cry.name: Starcaller Cry
Starcaller Cry.effect: Pulls in enemies with gravitational wave. Follow up with an addition input to slam down with gravity-infused swords

Waterfowl Dance.name: Waterfowl Dance
Waterfowl Dance.effect: Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks

Black Flame Tornado.name: Black Flame Tornado
Black Flame Tornado.effect: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

Cragblade.name: Cragblade
Cragblade.effect: Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.

Double Slash.name: Double Slash
Double Slash.effect: Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow up attacks.

Enchanted Shot.name: Enchanted Shot
Enchanted Shot.effect: Shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

Gravitas.name: Gravitas
Gravitas.effect: Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in.

Loretta's Slash.name: Loretta's Slash
Loretta's Slash.effect: Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

Seppuku.name: Seppuku
Seppuku.effect: Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

Blade of Death.name: Blade of Death
Blade of Death.effect: Blade-like projectile reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP

Bloodhound's Finesse.name: Bloodhound's Finesse
Bloodhound's Finesse.effect:
Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

Corpse Piler.name: Corpse Piler
Corpse Piler.effect: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input, for further successive attacks.

Erdtree Slam.name: Erdtree Slam
Erdtree Slam.effect: After jumping high in the air, crashing down sents golden shockwaves in all directions

Fires of Slumber.name: Fires of Slumber
Fires of Slumber.effect: The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.

Flame Spit.name: Flame Spit
Flame Spit.effect: Launch a fireball from the barrel

Golden Retaliation.name: Golden Retaliation
Golden Retaliation.effect:
Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.
This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

Gravity Bolt.name: Gravity Bolt
Gravity Bolt.effect: Sends a bolt crashing down a short distance away. Can be fired in rapid succession

Great-Serpent Hunt.name: Great-Serpent Hunt
Great-Serpent Hunt.effect:
Powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward
thrust

Oath of Vengeance.name: Oath of Vengeance
Oath of Vengeance.effect: Temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

Onyx Lord's Repulsion.name: Onyx Lord's Repulsion
Onyx Lord's Repulsion.effect: Create a gravity well to send enemies flying away

Ordovis's Vortex.name: Ordovis's Vortex
Ordovis's Vortex.effect: Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.

Regal Roar.name: Regal Roar
Regal Roar.effect:
Raising attack power, while sending
out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against

Sorcery of the Crozier.name: Sorcery of the Crozier
Sorcery of the Crozier.effect: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing projectiles that chase enemies

Surge of Faith.name: Surge of Faith
Surge of Faith.effect: Rain down fireballs in all directions

Zamor Ice Storm.name: Zamor Ice Storm
Zamor Ice Storm.effect: Freezing storm that batters the surrounding

Barricade Shield.name: Barricade Shield
Barricade Shield.effect: Focus your energy into your shield, temporarily hardening

Blood Tax.name: Blood Tax
Blood Tax.effect: Unleashes a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.

Carian Retaliation.name: Carian Retaliation
Carian Retaliation.effect: Dispels enemy spells and retaliates with glintblades.

Charge Forth.name: Charge Forth
Charge Forth.effect: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust Hold to cover a greater distance.

Endure.name: Endure
Endure.effect: Boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

Flame of the Redmanes.name: Flame of the Redmanes
Flame of the Redmanes.effect: Produces a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

Mighty Shot.name: Mighty Shot
Mighty Shot.effect: Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

No Skill.name: No Skill
No Skill.effect: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.

Royal Knight's Resolve.name: Royal Knight's Resolve
Royal Knight's Resolve.effect: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

Sacred Blade.name: Sacred Blade
Sacred Blade.effect: Holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile

Spinning Slash.name: Spinning Slash
Spinning Slash.effect:
Slash foes as your body spins.
This momentum can connect into a final heavy attack.

Storm Wall.name: Storm Wall
Storm Wall.effect: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a Normal parry.

Stormcaller.name: Stormcaller
Stormcaller.effect: Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

Sword Dance.name: Sword Dance
Sword Dance.effect: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

Thops's Barrier.name: Thops's Barrier
Thops's Barrier.effect: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

Unsheathe.name: Unsheathe
Unsheathe.effect: holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

Vow of the Indomitable.name: Vow of the Indomitable
Vow of the Indomitable.effect: Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

Wild Strikes.name: Wild Strikes
Wild Strikes.effect:
Swing armament with wild abandon.
Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

Golden Land.name: Golden Land
Golden Land.effect: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

Storm Assault.name: Storm Assault
Storm Assault.effect: Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

Thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
Thunderstorm.effect: Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm.

Assassin's Gambit.name: Assassin's Gambit
Assassin's Gambit.effect: Masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.

Chilling Mist.name: Chilling Mist
Chilling Mist.effect: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.

Flaming Strike.name: Flaming Strike
Flaming Strike.effect: Emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.

Ground Slam.name: Ground Slam
Ground Slam.effect: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

Hoarfrost Stomp.name: Hoarfrost Stomp
Hoarfrost Stomp.effect: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.

Ice Spear.name: Ice Spear
Ice Spear.effect: Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

Lifesteal Fist.name: Lifesteal Fist
Lifesteal Fist.effect: A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

Lightning Ram.name: Lightning Ram
Lightning Ram.effect: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

Lightning Slash.name: Lightning Slash
Lightning Slash.effect: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock.

Prayerful Strike.name: Prayerful Strike
Prayerful Strike.effect: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

Prelate's Charge.name: Prelate's Charge
Prelate's Charge.effect: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge

Sacred Order.name: Sacred Order
Sacred Order.effect: Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence

Sacred Ring of Light.name: Sacred Ring of Light
Sacred Ring of Light.effect: Gather a sacred ring of light

Storm Blade.name: Storm Blade
Storm Blade.effect: Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession

Vacuum Slice.name: Vacuum Slice
Vacuum Slice.effect: Shearin vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile

Carian Greatsword.name: Carian Greatsword
Carian Greatsword.effect: Transform blade into a magical greatsword

Soul Stifler.name: Soul Stifler
Soul Stifler.effect: Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma. Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced defense.

Barbaric Roar.name: Barbaric Roar
Barbaric Roar.effect: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks.

Barrage.name: Barrage
Barrage.effect: Archery Skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

Beast's Roar.name: Beast's Roar
Beast's Roar.effect: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.

Bloody Slash.name: Bloody Slash
Bloody Slash.effect: Unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

Braggart's Roar.name: Braggart's Roar
Braggart's Roar.effect: Raises attack power, defense and stamina recover speed.

Parry Skill.name: Parry Skill
Parry Skill.effect: Use this Skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This gives you a chance for a critical hit.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.effect:
Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance.
Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

Spectral Lance.name: Spectral Lance
Spectral Lance.effect: Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

Buckler Parry.name: Buckler Parry
Buckler Parry.effect: Use this Skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This is faster than a regular parry.

Golden Tempering.name: Golden Tempering
Golden Tempering.effect: Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence. While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.

Sea of Magma.name: Sea of Magma
Sea of Magma.effect: Cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma.

Spinning Chain.name: Spinning Chain
Spinning Chain.effect: Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successful attack.

Determination.name: Determination
Determination.effect: Hold your armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

Eruption.name: Eruption
Eruption.effect: Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava.

Giant Hunt.name: Giant Hunt
Giant Hunt.effect: Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

Glintblade Phalanx.name: Glintblade Phalanx
Glintblade Phalanx.effect: Forms a defensive arch of magic glintblades.

Golden Slam.name: Golden Slam
Golden Slam.effect: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.

Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker.name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker.effect: Violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave.

Impaling Thrust.name: Impaling Thrust
Impaling Thrust.effect: Build power, then lunge forward for a long thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.

Lion's Claw.name: Lion's Claw
Lion's Claw.effect: Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.

Piercing Fang.name: Piercing Fang
Piercing Fang.effect: Make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.

Poison Moth Flight.name: Poison Moth Flight
Poison Moth Flight.effect:
Slash with a poison-infused blade. Strike poisoned foes to deal significant
damage.

Quickstep.name: Quickstep
Quickstep.effect: Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

Raptor of the Mists.name: Raptor of the Mists
Raptor of the Mists.effect: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

Repeating Thrust.name: Repeating Thrust
Repeating Thrust.effect: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts. This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful. It can be used on all thrusting armaments.

Spinning Strikes.name: Spinning Strikes
Spinning Strikes.effect: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. ifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

Spinning Weapon.name: Spinning Weapon
Spinning Weapon.effect: Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

Square Off.name: Square Off
Square Off.effect: Slash up through enemy guards with a normal attack, or run and thrust with a strong attack.

Stamp Sweep.name: Stamp Sweep
Stamp Sweep.effect: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

Stamp Upward Cut.name: Stamp Upward Cut
Stamp Upward Cut.effect:
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

Storm Stomp.name: Storm Stomp
Storm Stomp.effect: Stomp the ground hard to kick up a temporary storm.

Through and Through.name: Through and Through
Through and Through.effect:
Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance.
Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

Troll's Roar.name: Troll's Roar
Troll's Roar.effect: Powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes. Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.

War Cry.name: War Cry
War Cry.effect: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

Firebreather.name: Firebreather
Firebreather.effect: Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

Glintstone Dart.name: Glintstone Dart
Glintstone Dart.effect:
Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

Glintstone Pebble.name: Glintstone Pebble
Glintstone Pebble.effect: Employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

Spinning Wheel.name: Spinning Wheel
Spinning Wheel.effect: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed.

Torch Attack.name: Torch Attack
Torch Attack.effect: Thrust your torch forward to set foes ablaze.

Golden Vow.name: Golden Vow
Golden Vow.effect: Granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

Kick.name: Kick
Kick.effect: Push an enemy back with a high kick.Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.

Poisonous Mist.name: Poisonous Mist
Poisonous Mist.effect: Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retains its poison for a while.
